column2: Is this a Cogna?[~]Because I don’t think they’re supposed to put it in this ga—
Whoooa! Don’t say another word![~]This thing is RIGHT where it’s supposed to be.
Reynn just stopped a world[~]much the-bigger than this one from imploding.
And so, thanks to Reynn’s valiant efforts,[~]a world bigger than this one was spared from chaos.
